name: Avoid Physical files with more than X fields  (DDS400)
description: This rules searches for all Physical files with more than X fields
output:
This report lists DDS400 physical File having more than X fields.
It provides the following information:
DDS400 Physical File full name
rationale: For maintainability and readability reasons, the Psysical files should not have more than X fields
remediation: Try to reduce the number of Physical with more than X fields.
total: Total number of DDS400 Physical File
